title: Set Operations with Venn Diagrams
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Computer Science and Discrete Mathematics
description: Interactive p5.js Venn diagram that computes union, intersection, difference, and symmetric difference while showing equivalent Python set code.

learningObjectives: Compute union, intersection, difference, and symmetric difference for two sets.
Demonstrate how visual Venn regions correspond to Python set operators |, &, -, and ^.
Explain how swapping sets changes directional difference (A-B vs B-A).

pedagogical.teachingStrategy: Visual-to-code bridging with immediate computational feedback
keyQuestions: Which region of the Venn diagram corresponds to each set operator?
Why does A-B change when sets are swapped, while union does not?
assessmentOpportunities: Ask students to compute output before pressing operation buttons
Modify set contents and verify computed code output
